    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Naelektritev teles in elektrostatično lepljenje</string>
            <string language="en">Charging Objects and Static Cling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufladennachrichten und Static haften an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les objets et la charge statique de remplissage 
s'accrochent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os objetos e a estática carregando aderem-se</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli oggetti e l'elettricità statica caricantesi 
aderiscono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αντικείμενα χρέωσης και στατικός προσκολλώνται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los objetos y los parásitos atmosféricos de 
carga se aferran</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Postopki naelektritve teles in vpliv naelektrenih teles na neelektrena.</string>
            <string language="en">The procedures to charge object and effect of such object on non-charged one.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatično lepenje</string>
            <string language="en">static cling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatika</string>
            <string language="en">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Prozeduren, zum der Nachricht und des 
Effektes solcher Nachricht auf der nicht-belasteter aufzuladen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les procédures pour charger l'objet et l'effet 
d'un tel objet sur non-chargé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os procedimentos para carregar o objeto e o 
efeito de tal objeto no non-carregado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le procedure per caricare oggetto ed effetto di 
tale oggetto su quella non-caricata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι διαδικασίες για να χρεώσει το αντικείμενο και την 
επίδραση τέτοιου αντικειμένου μη- non-charged ένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los procedimientos para cargar el objeto y el 
efecto de tal objeto en no-cargado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Static haften an</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la charge statique s'accrochent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a estática adere-se</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'elettricità statica aderisce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στατικός προσκολληθείτε</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los parásitos atmosféricos se aferran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electrostática</string>
          </keyword>
